strings.evolution:
Now I can fight as my brother does.
We shall protect those precious to us, and put an end to this war!
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma was the youngest in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession, and Ramza's full sister. After coming to doubt the motives of her elder half brothers and the war they waged, she decided to join Ramza, who severed ties with House Beoulve by absconding. Originally intending only to help Ramza locate the auracite within the Orbonne Monastery, she was unfortunately caught in the conspiracy then transpiring in Ivalice, which greatly altered her fate.
strings.fusion: I feel a warm energy overcoming my body... It is unlike that of the sacred stones. Perhaps I may at last be of some use to my brother.
strings.summon: To live in Ivalice is a wondrous blessing. You love your world as well, do you not? If so, then you must protect it!

strings.evolution:
This power is like a fever!
But I wonder if I haven't become
a little stronger...?
strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma is the youngest in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession, and is a cheerful and bright girl, adored by her closest brother, Ramza. After losing her childhood friend Tietra to the events that unfolded in the Battle of Ziekden Fortress, she began to question the motives of her two eldest brothers, and decided to join Ramza on his quest. It wasn't long before she too was caught up in the web of conspiracies crisscrossing Ivalice like tripwires.
strings.fusion: What can I do...so that no more people must suffer in the manner Tietra did?
strings.summon: I may not be as strong as my brother Ramza, but I can still aid you in battle!

strings.affinity: You have taught me that there are things even I can do to help. Now, allow me to show my gratitude.
strings.description: A young girl who appears in the tales of holy stones known as auracite in the distant world of Ivalice. Alma is the youngest of four siblings in the honorable House Beoulve's line of succession. She attends the Eagrose Preparatory Akademy, and is a cheerful and bright girl who readily befriends people across class boundaries. Alma favored her full brother, Ramza, over their two elder half brothers, and spent most of her life in a monastery. There she met Princess Ovelia, to whom she became a close friend after realizing they shared similar circumstances.
strings.fusion: I shall teach you how to whistle on a blade of grass. There is a small secret to it, you know!
strings.summon:
I am going with you!
I am convinced I shall prove useful somehow!
